buildCommand: rm -rf public && mkdir -p public/demos public/include public/images && cp "Canvas 7 Files/demo-car.html" public/index.html && cp "Canvas 7 Files/demo-car.html" public/demo-car.html && cp -r "Canvas 7 Files/demos/car" public/demos/car && cp -r "Canvas 7 Files/css" public/css && cp -r "Canvas 7 Files/js" public/js && cp -r "Canvas 7 Files/include/rs-plugin" public/include/ && cp -r "Canvas 7 Files/images" public/images && cp "Canvas 7 Files/favicon.ico" public/
